attributes.title: D&D, but… We’re All Rogues!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of ROGUES.
attributes.description:
Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of ROGUES. Usually players have a mixed group of fighters, clerics, and wizards fighting FOR a kingdom. This time, the party is all rogues and their mission is to steal FROM a kingdom.
Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3xxTlmp.

attributes.title: D&D, But... It's a Murder Mystery?!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a MURDER MYSTERY. Usually, the players are doing the slaying for their noble benefactor, but today they have to find out who slew theirs.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a MURDER MYSTERY. Usually, the players are doing the slaying for their noble benefactor, but today they have to find out who slew theirs. Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3QOjmXq.
attributes.display_title: 2022:E2 - D&D, But... It's a Murder Mystery?!

attributes.title: D&D, but… We're All Dragons!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of DRAGONS. Usually the players are adventurers trying to fight and defeat a dragon, but this time they themselves are dragons that are just trying to survive.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of DRAGONS. Usually the players are adventurers trying to fight and defeat a dragon, but this time they themselves are dragons that are just trying to survive. Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3AcRF4R.

attributes.title: D&D, But… We’re the Dungeon Bosses!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of DUNGEON BOSSES. Today, this group of dungeon bosses defends their hoard, and hopefully, their power.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of DUNGEON BOSSES. Today, this group of dungeon bosses defends their hoard, and hopefully, their power. Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3It6L8y.
attributes.display_title: 2022:E4 - D&D, But… We’re the Dungeon Bosses!

attributes.title: D&D, But... We're All Vampires!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRES. Usually players are hunting monsters, but this time they're becoming monsters in their quest for revenge.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRES. Usually players are hunting monsters, but this time they're becoming monsters in their quest for revenge. Will they use their newfound power for justice or will they give into their darker urges? Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3IKcvur.

attributes.title: D&D, But... We're All Vampire Lords!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRE LORDS.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRE LORDS. The party turned into vampires in order to fulfill their quest for justice, but how will they spend the rest of eternity? Will they be able to retain any of their humanity? Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3zvEMlO.
attributes.display_title: 2022:E6 - D&D, But... We're All Vampire Lords!

attributes.title: D&D, But... We're All Vampire Hunters!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRE HUNTERS.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party of VAMPIRE HUNTERS. While most D&D parties train to fight anything in the Monster Manual, this party has specialized their skills to take on a blood-sucking legion of vampires. Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3Jg5l1g.
attributes.display_title: 2022:E7 - D&D, But... We're All Vampire Hunters!

attributes.title: D&D, But... We're All Hunted by Vampires!
attributes.caption: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party that's HUNTED BY VAMPIRES. Usually vampire hunters take the fight to the monsters, but this party has pissed off the wrong vampire lord.
attributes.description: Today we're playing D&D, but... there's a twist. This game of Dungeons & Dragons features a party that's HUNTED BY VAMPIRES. Usually vampire hunters take the fight to the monsters, but this party has pissed off the wrong vampire lord. The hunters become the hunted. Will they survive until morning? Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/3SAdr9c.
attributes.display_title: 2022:E8 - D&D, But... We're All Hunted by Vampires!
